abstract: Pope Francis's visit to New York City has overshadowed many other events and announcements occurring on same day, much to chagrin of those tasked with publicizing them.
lead_paragraph: With Pope Francis in town, those who toil in public relations struggled to have their entreaties heard on the holiest of busy news days.

headline.main: Sweet Smell of Not Today: Press Agents Wait Out ‘This Pope Thing’

snippet: With Pope Francis in town, those who toil in public relations struggled to have their entreaties heard on the holiest of busy news days.
